dr.app.gui.chart
Interface Plot

All Known Implementing Classes:
AreaPlot, CategoryDensityPlot, DensityEstimatePlot, FrequencyPlot, KDENumericalDensityPlot, LineDistributionPlot, LinePlot, NumericalDensityPlot, ParentPlot, PDFPlot, Plot.AbstractPlot, RegressionPlot, ScatterPlot
public interface Plot

Plot.java

Description: Provides an interface for plots. Plots are elements of a chart that renders some data in a particular style. Multiple plots can be added to the same chart to get complex results.

Version:
$Id: Plot.java,v 1.23 2006/01/03 10:26:20 rambaut Exp $
Author:
Andrew Rambaut, Alexei Drummond
